original_text: Jesus knew what they were talking about. So he said to them, ‘You should not be arguing with each other about the bread. You should trust me more than you do.
korean_text: 예수께서 아시고 이르시되 믿음이 작은 자들아 어찌 떡이 없으므로 서로 논의하느냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus knew what they were talking about.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 그들이 무엇을 이야기하고 있는지 알고 계셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: 'You should not be arguing with each other
